contest-event.event-date: April 27, 1974 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas.
